title: What is the one month fee for class 9 in Byju's? - Quora

response.answer_text: The business development associate at your home would tell you higher rates as they have to reach their weekly targets but the actual cost for 1 year which is for 9th grade would be minimum price of 16000 which is the and maximum price of 20000 for the SD card alone and for a 7 inch tablet which would cost you 5000 and 10 inch tablet would cost you 12500. The BDA’s could even give it to you for lesser price if they want to if they are in the idea to club orders.
